SEARCH

Class FrameBuilder

java.lang.Object
FrameBuilder
public class FrameBuilder extends Object
A class to allow building a JFrame using the Builder Pattern
See Also:
  • Builder Pattern

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    FrameBuilder()
    Constructs a new FrameBuilder instance
    FrameBuilder(String id)
    Constucts a new FrameBuilder instance and registers the JFrame

    • size

      public FrameBuilder size(int width, int height)
      Sets the size of the JFrame. Should not be used with pack()

      height - Desired height
      Returns:
      This FrameBuilder instance

    • closeOperation

      public FrameBuilder closeOperation(int closeOperation)
      Sets the close operation of the JFrame. If not set, the default is EXIT_ON_CLOSE
      Parameters:
      closeOperation - WindowConstants.{DISPOSE,DO_NOTHING,EXIT,HIDE}_ON_CLOSE
      Returns:
      This FrameBuilder instance

    • pack

      public FrameBuilder pack()
      Automatically resize the JFrame to just fit all Components. Should not be used with size()
      Returns:
      This FrameBuilder instance
      See Also:
      • size(int, int)

    • menuBar

      public FrameBuilder menuBar(JMenu menu)
      Adds a JMenuBar with one JMenu to the JFrame
      Parameters:
      menu - The single JMenu to be added the the JMenuBar
      Returns:
      This FrameBuilder instance
